Additionally, its activated red tail lights and yellow caution lights indicate possible movement or an intention to move soon. These vehicles, including passenger cars on the left with their tail lights on, necessitate cautious speed adjustments or lane changes by the ego car. Further down the road, a traffic light is visible, displaying a red light for the direction in which the ego vehicle and the other vehicles are heading.
